text.heading: An Abstract Post Heading
text.description: Which is worse, that everyone has his price, or that the price is always so low.

text.heading: Down with this sort of thing
text.description: I'm killing time while I wait for life to shower me with meaning and happiness.

text.heading: The World Ended Yesterday
text.description: The only skills I have the patience to learn are those that have no real application in life.

text.heading: Take Me I'm Yours
text.description: Don't tell me to stop shopping. I don't need that kind of negativity in my life.

text.heading: Shopping is Art !
text.description: Whoever said that money can't buy happiness, simply didn't know where to go SHOPPING.
